* Difference in fertility levels presumes other factors like migration and life expectancy remain status quo

* Rapid population aging means "low fertility + high life expectancy + low inbound migration"

* Slow population aging means "high fertility + low life expectancy + high inbound migration"

Source: 통계청 「장래인구추계」 - 시나리오별 추계인구(총인구, 인구구조, 성비 등)
